member.name: T:ModernWPF.Animation
member.summary: Quick utility for doing simple ad-hoc animations.

member.summary: Slides the element in with translate transform.

member.summary: Slides the element in with translate transform.

member.summary: Slides the element in with translate transform

member.name: M:ModernWPF.Animation.FadeIn(System.Windows.UIElement,System.TimeSpan,System.Action)
member.summary: Animates the element's opacity from 0 to 1.

member.name: M:ModernWPF.Animation.FadeOut(System.Windows.UIElement,System.TimeSpan,System.Action)
member.summary: Animates the element's opacity to 1.

member.name: P:ModernWPF.Animation.ShouldAnimate
member.summary: Gets a flag indicating whether animation should be used. This does not stop controls from using animations in this class.
member.value: true if the app should animate; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:ModernWPF.Animation.TypicalDuration
member.summary: Gets the a typical animation duration.

member.name: P:ModernWPF.Animation.TypicalEasing
member.summary: Gets the typical easing function.

member.name: P:ModernWPF.Animation.TypicalSlideOffset
member.summary: Gets the typical slide offset value. Default is 15.

member.name: T:ModernWPF.AnimationSpeed
member.summary: Named values for common animation duration in ms.

member.name: F:ModernWPF.AnimationSpeed.None
member.summary: No duration, 0.

member.name: F:ModernWPF.AnimationSpeed.Fast
member.summary: Short duration, 100ms,

member.name: F:ModernWPF.AnimationSpeed.Normal
member.summary: Normal duration, 250ms.

member.name: F:ModernWPF.AnimationSpeed.Slow
member.summary: Long duration, 500ms.

member.summary: Slide from the right.

member.value: true if to detect keyboard keys; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:ModernWPF.Converters.MultiBoolVisibleConverter
member.summary: Converts multiple or values into a single .

member.name: M:ModernWPF.Converters.MultiBoolVisibleConverter.Convert(System.Object[],System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts source values to a value for the binding target. The data binding engine calls this method when it propagates the values from source bindings to the binding target.
member.param: The array of values that the source bindings in the produces. The value indicates that the source binding has no value to provide for conversion.
The type of the binding target property.
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: A converted value.If the method returns null, the valid null value is used.A return value of . indicates that the converter did not produce a value, and that the binding will use the if it is available, or else will use the default value.A return value of . indicates that the binding does not transfer the value or use the or the default value.

member.name: M:ModernWPF.Converters.MultiBoolVisibleConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type[],System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Not supported.
member.param: The value that the binding target produces.
The array of types to convert to. The array length indicates the number and types of values that are suggested for the method to return.
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: An array of values that have been converted from the target value back to the source values.

member.name: P:ModernWPF.Converters.MultiBoolVisibleConverter.Instance
member.summary: Gets the singleton instance for this converter.
